sql.up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_profiles (id text PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), username text UNIQUE NOT NULL, display_name text, avatar_url text, banner_url text, pronouns text, status text DEFAULT 'offline', display_name_color text DEFAULT '#667eea', display_name_animation text DEFAULT 'none', rainbow_speed int DEFAULT 3, badges jsonb DEFAULT '[]', bio text, last_seen timestamptz DEFAULT now(), is_online boolean DEFAULT false, profile_complete boolean DEFAULT false, profile_card_css text, easy_customization_data jsonb DEFAULT '{}', blocked_users text[] DEFAULT '{}', created_at timestamptz DEFAULT now(), updated_at timestamptz DEFAULT now())
